name: The Trickster Hideout
description:
Hello, my name is Sergio Sáez Calero and I'm a student of a Videogames Design & Development Degree.

This is a practice of our Level Design Subject, the practice consist on take one dungeon, of the page one paper dungeon, and i chose the dungeon of Christian Urbini, The trickster hideout.

 CONTROLS

- Arrows: movement

- Spacebar: interact

- Left Click: movement / interact
